param.name: link_text_align
param.label: Link Alignment
param.description: Text Alignment for myJSpace Page Links

param.name: link_sort_method
param.label: Link Sort Method
param.description: How the list is to be sorted in the display

param.name: fixed_itemid
param.label: Fixed Itemid Number
param.description: Fixed Itemid will allow this module to show links to a fixed template. It overides the template setting in myJSpace Admin.

param.name: use_fixed_itemid
param.label: Use Fixed Itemid
param.description: Check to use 'Fixed Itemid Number' above, if required. In default this module will use Joomla! assigned Itemid.

param.name: use_this_style
param.label: Use Built-in Styles
param.description: Yes to use module built-in Styles, No to use Template Styles

param.name: number_of_links
param.label: Number of Links to Display ( set 0 for all )
param.description: Number of Links Displayed by this instance of module.

param.name: start_link_number
param.label: Start with Link Number ?
param.description: List Starts with this Link or Row Number

param.name: period
param.label: Updating Period in milliSeconds ( future ).
param.description: How often the display is updated.( future implementation )

param.name: show_user_control_panel
param.label: Show User Conrol Panel
param.description: Check to Show Control Panel for Users

param.name: show_statistics
param.label: Show Statistics
param.description: Check to reveal Page and User Infomation

param.name: datetime_format
param.label: Date and Time Style (PHP)
param.description: Dates and Times presented in this format

option.value: l dS \of F Y h:i:s A
D M j G:i:s T Y

param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: Module Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module (table.moduletable or div.moduletable), this allows individual module styling
